Today, during my visit to the Ministry of Education, I saw the comprehensive development plan of the UAE school of curricula, skills, assessment and indicators https://t.co/PmE4oc04pk
The plan includes new approaches to technology, innovative design, health sciences, career guidance, life skills and business management https://t.co/dp77sh3vZT
The goal is for our students to get used to critical thinking and to develop teamwork, innovation and problem solving skills using ICT
I also saw the new system, which divides students into a general path and an advanced path instead of literary and scientific in order to keep abreast of the scientific tendencies of our students
I liked the "elite track" to provide special care to our children who are engaged in science and mathematics .. They will lead our scientific and vital sectors in the future

The language of the age of computer programming and science will be a gradual and complete curriculum from the first to the twelfth. The illiteracy in the future is the illiteracy of computer science and programming

The development process also focuses on free and specialized reading skills and the formation of an open, tolerant and Emirati personality capable of keeping abreast of the scientific changes around it

Education is a secretariat .. Our teachers and teachers have challenges before them, and they have confidence, and our appreciation for them has no limits .. They are the basis for the success of any development

The goal is to develop students' critical thinking and teamwork skills as well as solving and innovation using ICT tools.
Programming and computer science will be core skills through year 1 to 12: the illiteracy of the future will be computer illiteracy.
On January 1, 2015, I assumed my second term in office as President. I was elected by another 54 million votes. #Democracy
In my possession, I undertook to maintain, defend and comply with the Constitution. I respected the commitment and I am proud of it #Democracy
I have always believed in democracy and the rule of law, and I saw in the Constitution of 1988 one of the great achievements of our people #Democracy
I would never attempt against what I believe or do acts contrary to the interests of those who elected me #Democracy
#AOVIVO: Dilma speaks in @SenadoFederal #Democracia Watch! https://t.co/OHgQZmvrLX
Among my faults is not disloyalty or cowardice. I do not betray commitments, principles and those who fight next to me #Democracy
I did not change sides. Despite being burdened with injustice on my shoulders, I continued to fight for Democracy.
I resisted the storm of terror that was beginning to swallow me, in the darkness of the bitter times in which the country lived. #Democracy
I fought for a sovereign Brazil, more equal and where there was justice. I'm proud of that. Who believes, fights. #Democracy
In the struggle against the dictatorship, I received in my body the marks of torture. I bore the suffering of the prison for years #Democracy
At the age of almost seventy years, it would not be now, after being a mother and grandmother, that I would abdicate the principles that have always guided me #Democracy
I have been uncompromising in defending honesty in the management of public affairs. #Democracy
By exercising the Presidency of the Republic, I have honored my commitment to my country, to democracy, to the rule of law. #Democracy
In the face of the accusations directed against me, I can not but feel the bitter and bitter taste of injustice and arbitrariness. #Democracy
And so, as in the past, I resist. Do not expect from me the obsequious silence of the cowards #Democracy
In the past, with weapons, and today, with legal rhetoric, they again intend to attack democracy and the rule of law #Democracy
If some tear your past and negotiate the benefits of the present, q respond to your conscience and before history #Democracy
I have to regret what they were and what they became. And resist. Always Resist #Democracy
Resist to awaken consciences still asleep w / q, together, let's put the foot on the ground q is on the right side of the story #Democracy
I do not fight for my office for vanity or for attachment to power, as it is for those who have no character, principles or utopias #ForDemocracy
I fight for democracy, for truth and justice. I fight for the people of my country, for their welfare #Democracy
The most important thing is that I can look at myself and see the face of someone who, marked by time, has the strength to defend their rights #Democracy
For having a clear conscience in relation to what I did in the Presidency, I personally come to the presence of those who will judge me #Democracy
I come to look into the eyes of Your Excellencies, and say that I did not commit a crime of responsibility #Democracy
Today Brazil, the world and history watch us and await the outcome of this process of impeachment #Democracy
Look how bad it is getting! How much more crime, how many more shootings, will it take for African-Americans and Latinos to vote Trump=SAFE!
The evidence makes it clear that the accusations directed against me are only pretexts, based on fragile legal rhetoric. #Democracy
They are pretexts to overthrow, through a process of impeachment without crime of responsibility, a legitimate government #Democracy
The government of a woman who dared to win 2 presidential elections. They are pretexts to make viable a coup in the Constitution. #Democracy
What is at stake in impeachment is not just my mandate. It is respect for the polls, the will of the people and the Constitution. #Democracy
What is at stake are the achievements of the last 13 years: the gains of the population, the poorest people and the middle class #Democracy
What is at stake is the achievement of stability, which seeks the fiscal balance but does not give up social programs #Democracy
What is at stake is the future of the country, the opportunity and the hope to advance ever more #ForDemocracy
In the elections, the winning government program was not this one now designed by the Interim Government and defended by the accusers #Democracy
What the interim government intends, if transformed into actual, is a real attack on the achievements of the last years #Democracy
Inner-city crime is reaching record levels. African-Americans will vote for Trump because they know I will stop the slaughter going on!
The most frightening threat is to freeze for unbelievable 20 years health, education, sanitation and housing costs #Democracy
The truth is that the 2014 election result was a rude coup in sectors of the conservative Brazilian elite #Democracy
As is characteristic of the authoritarian elites, they did not see in the will of the people the legitimating element. They wanted the power to qqr price #Democracy
There was no attempt to discuss and approve the best proposal for the country. What was intended was the affirmation of "how much worse" #Democracy
In this turbulent environment, political risk has become a central element for deepening the economic crisis #Democracy

I will be tried for crimes that I did not commit before the trial of one who is accused of having committed very serious illicit acts #Democracy

They asked me why I did not resign. I would never do it because I have an irrevocable commitment to the Democratic State of Law. #Democracy
I would never do it because I never give up the fight. #Democracy
Betrayal, aggression and prejudice haunted. But they were always overcome by the solidarity and disposition of the struggle of millions #Democracy
Women have been a mainstay of my resistance. They covered me with flowers and protected me with their solidarity #Democracy
Bravas Brazilian women, who have the honor and duty to represent as the 1st President of the Republic #Democracy
I am committed to meeting the demand of most Brazilians: to call them to decide on the future of our Country. #Democracy
Dialogue, participation and direct and free voting are the best weapons we have for the preservation of democracy. #Democracy
I trust the senator ladies and senators will do justice. I have a clear conscience #Democracy
The accusations against me are unjust. Cassar, in definitive terms, my mandate is like submitting myself to the political death penalty #Democracy
This is the second trial I am subjected to in which democracy is sitting, along with me, in the dock #Democracy
For the first time, I was sentenced by an exceptional court. From that time, the record of my presence was in front of my executioners #Democracy
Now that African-Americans are seeing what a bad job Hillary type policy and management has done to the inner-cities, they want TRUMP!
At the moment I was looking at them with their heads held high as they hid their faces, afraid to be judged by history. #Democracy
Today, there is no illegal imprisonment, my judges arrived aq by the same popular vote that led me to the presidency. #Democracy
I have the greatest respect for everyone, but I keep my head held high, looking into the eyes of my judges #Democracy
I suffer again with the feeling of injustice and the fear that, once again, democracy will be condemned along with me #Democracy
And I have no doubt that, this time, we will all be judged by history as well #Democracy
I make a final appeal to all the senators: do not accept a coup that, instead of solving, will aggravate the Brazilian crisis. #Democracy
I ask you to do justice to an honest president, who has never committed an illegal act in personal life or public functions q exercised #Democracy
I ask: vote against impeachment; vote for democracy #Democracy
